welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wandsworth, a charming borough in the heart of London! Known for its vibrant culture, beautiful parks, and bustling high street, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. We hope you have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport caters to VIP and executive travelers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport is a modern and compact facility, offering a range of amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Oneworld airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly SkyTeam and other airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The main terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly British Airways and its partners.

wifi.note: Free for 45 minutes, then a fee applies for longer use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves all commercial flights and provides a range of services for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering exclusive amenities and services for VIP passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free Wi-Fi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the airport's main terminal and serves a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the airport's secondary terminal and serves a variety of airlines and destinations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the Wi-Fi for free for up to 90 minutes.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport offers a modern and efficient travel experience for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Farnborough Airport caters to the needs of high-end travelers and offers luxurious amenities and services.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and offers luxurious amenities for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Luton Airport, primarily used by low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and bandwidth.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
